summary_text: Quarterly Board Update — Transcript (abridged) Date: 2025-11-10 Attendees: @ceo, @cfo, @pm_arul, @lead_shiva, @data_alex Opening: - Overview of Q3 goals, risks, and hiring plan.
key_points: Overview of Q3 goals, risks, and hiring plan
Upload, Summarize, Store flow works; PDF/DOCX parsing pending
Prioritize export endpoints and History panel for demos
Keep temperature low for consistency; retries at 3
decisions: Cap uploads at 50 MB with a warning on large files
action_items: @lead_shiva implement CSV + Markdown export endpoints — due 2025-11-10 at 04:15 pm
@pm_arul add History list UI with version picker — due 2025-11-11
@data_alex validate PDF/DOCX parsing on 5 real samples — deadline 2025-11-21
Follow up with pilot users about chunking needs — by 2025-11-22
